snippet: The archive materials, which total some 3,000 linear feet of material, were praised by the library as providing “unique evidence of intellectual life in the United States in the second half of the 20th century.”
abstract: The archive materials, which total some 3,000 linear feet of material, were praised by the library as providing “unique evidence of intellectual life in the United States in the second half of the 20th century.”

headline.main: New York Public Library Acquires Archive of The New York Review of Books
headline.print_headline: New York Review Archive Goes to Public Library
